Meet Ingrid

Meet Ingrid! She started singing with Halcyon back when she was in grade 9. Now, 5 years later, she is a first-year Nursing student at the University of Regina and loves everything and anything Broadway!

As such, one of her favourite memories was the whole broadway concert from 2016 but in particular loved the choreography for Step in Time as well as Jolly Holiday.

Image courtesy of Andrea Norberg Photography
